EmailTemplate.name: DBS final reminder - offered role before 6/5
EmailTemplate.subject: URGENT: Final DBS reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. The email was sent from an unattended mailbox and responses are not reviewed. Please instead contact us on seasonalroles@the-challenge.org.
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
The NCS summer programme starts in less than a week, and we're aware that you still have not started your DBS application.
It is a legal requirement for all seasonal staff working on the NCS programme to have a valid DBS certificate. If you do not have one, we will withdraw you from any waves you are placed on and you will not be entitled to compensation.
Already have a valid certificate?
If you already have a DBS certificate, please first check it's valid. Your certificate needs to be:
Dated from 1st January 2015 'Enhanced' (it will state this at the top) Children's Barred List checked (it should not say 'not requested')
If your certificate meets these requirements, please upload a colour scanned/photograhped copy of the whole certificate (front and back pages) to the Essential Information page on your staffing portal.
Need to apply for a new DBS?
Follow these instructions to apply for a new certificate through GB Group You'll need up to four forms of ID to hand DBS applications can take up to six weeks to process - please start your application as soon as possible and ensure you get your documents verified at the Post Office by 17th June to avoid delays.
https://staffing.the-challenge.org/assets/2016DBSinstructionspostoffer.pdf
Any questions?
It's urgent that you get your DBS sorted as soon as possible to avoid missing out on work with summer. If you have any queries about the DBS application process, or your existing DBS certificate please get in touch with your local staffing team or contact us on seasonalroles@the-challenge.org.
Best wishes,
The Staffing Team The Challenge
